title: Wallet Check
description: Take a photo of your wallet with cash removed. Label it 'Goddess owns this'.
reward: Humiliation reminder of your financial role

title: Self-Evaluation
description: List 5 reasons why you're inferior to Me. Submit it without whining.

title: Dirty Confession
description: Confess a humiliating secret or weakness you would never tell anyone else. Remember, your Goddess deserves your shame.
reward: Possibly ignored. You’re not owed attention.

title: Useless Task
description: Write 'I am worthless without my Goddess' 100 times in a document and submit it.

title: Financial Fantasy
description: Describe in detail your ultimate financial ruin fantasy, where you're fully controlled by Me.

title: Foot Groveling Fantasy
description: Write a fantasy about being beneath My feet, degraded, ignored, and humiliated in front of others.

title: Loser's Budget
description: Submit your full weekly budget and explain what you’re cutting to prioritize tributes to Me.

title: Name Degradation
description: Choose a humiliating name for yourself and refer to yourself only that way in all messages to Me this week.

title: Slave Affirmation Recording
description: Record yourself reading a script of affirmations about My superiority and your submission. Submit it without hesitation.
reward: A chance to be ignored or mocked

title: Kneel for Me
description: Set a timer and kneel for Me for 15 minutes in silence. Take a photo after. Submit with the caption 'I exist to serve.'

title: Servant Meal
description: Eat a simple, cheap meal and send a photo. Explain how this reminds you that luxury is for Me, not you.
reward: No reward. Be grateful you eat at all.

title: Window Shopping
description: Browse luxury items online. Send Me screenshots and describe how owning them is not for you, but for Me.

title: Apology Letter
description: Write Me a formal apology letter for ever questioning My authority, even mentally.

title: Shame Playlist
description: Create a public music playlist titled 'Songs My Goddess Would Hate Me For'. Share the link.
